verses.verse: For <S%G444>men<s%> will be <S%G5367>lovers<s%> of <S%G5367>self,<s%> <S%G5366>lovers<s%> of <S%G5366>money,<s%> <S%G213>boastful,<s%> <S%G5244>arrogant,<s%> <S%G989>revilers,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G884>ungrateful,<s%> <S%G462>unholy,<s%>
<S%G2192>holding<s%> to a <S%G3446>form<s%> of <S%G2150>godliness,<s%> although they have <S%G720>denied<s%> its <S%G1411>power;<s%> and <S%G665>avoid<s%> such men as <S%G3778>these.<s%>

For <S%G1537>among<s%> them are <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1746>enter<s%> into <S%G3614>households<s%> and <S%G163>captivate<s%> <S%G1133>weak<s%> <S%G1133>women<s%> <S%G4987>weighed<s%> <S%G4987>down<s%> with <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G71>led<s%> on by <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G1939>impulses,<s%>
<S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G3129>learning<s%> and <S%G3368>never<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

And <S%G3739>just<s%> <S%G5158><s%> as <S%G2389>Jannes<s%> and <S%G2387>Jambres<s%> <S%G436>opposed<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G444>[men<s%>] <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G436>oppose<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> men of <S%G2704>depraved<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> <S%G96>rejected<s%> as <S%G4012>regards<s%> the <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

But they will not <S%G4298>make<s%> <S%G1909>further<s%> <S%G4183><s%> <S%G4298>progress;<s%> for their <S%G454>folly<s%> will be <S%G1552>obvious<s%> to <S%G3956>all,<s%> as <S%G2532>also<s%> that of <S%G1565>those<s%> [two] <S%G1096>came<s%> to be.

<S%G1375>persecutions,<s%> [and] <S%G3804>sufferings,<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> as <S%G1096>happened<s%> to me at <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> at <S%G2430>Iconium<s%> [and] at <S%G3082>Lystra;<s%> <S%G3634>what<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions<s%> I <S%G5297>endured,<s%> and out of them <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> me!
And <S%G2532>indeed,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2153>godly<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> will be <S%G1377>persecuted.<s%>
But <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> and <S%G1114>impostors<s%> will <S%G4298>proceed<s%> [from bad] to <S%G5501>worse,<s%> <S%G4105>deceiving<s%> and being <S%G4105>deceived.<s%>

You, <S%G1161>however,<s%> <S%G3306>continue<s%> in the <S%G3739>things<s%> you have <S%G3129>learned<s%> and become <S%G4104>convinced<s%> of, <S%G3609>knowing<s%> from <S%G5101>whom<s%> you have <S%G3129>learned<s%> [them];

and that from <S%G1025>childhood<s%> you have <S%G3609>known<s%> the <S%G2413>sacred<s%> <S%G1121>writings<s%> which are <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4679>give<s%> you the <S%G4679>wisdom<s%> that <S%G1519>leads<s%> to <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> which is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> is <S%G2315>inspired<s%> by <S%G2315>God<s%> and <S%G5624>profitable<s%> for <S%G1319>teaching,<s%> for <S%G7064>reproof,<s%> for <S%G1882>correction,<s%> for <S%G3809>training<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%>
that the <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G739>adequate,<s%> <S%G1822>equipped<s%> for <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>
